caption.center: RICHARD HUGHES, APPELLANT, v. STATE OF MISSOURI, RESPONDENT.

court.center: Missouri Court of Appeals, Western District.

opinion.posture: APPEAL FROM THE CIRCUIT COURT OF BUCHANAN COUNTY; RANDALL R. JACKSON, JUDGE.
opinion.attorneys:
Raymond L. Legg, Columbia, for appellant.
William L. Webster, Atty. Gen., Frank A. Jung, Asst. Atty. Gen., Jefferson City, for respondent.
opinion.panel: Before KENNEDY, P.J., and LOWENSTEIN and BERREY, JJ.Page 236
opinion.opinion_text:
[1] Appeal from denial of Rule 27.26 motion for post-conviction relief.
[2] Affirmed. Rule 84.16(b).
